content: for save the children s knit one save one campaign uses approx 3/4 oz of sport-weight yarn updated link-- 8/10/11- caps for good campaign 1 unfortunately it seems that save the children takes down the pattern or changes the pattern page after the campaign ends so it can be difficult to find the pattern when the campaign is not happening we will do our best to keep this page updated 1 http //www craftyarncouncil com/ q=node/63
